search.py¶

This module is to make the search in the GrAF files.

class search_replace.SearchReplace(filepath)[source]¶

Class that allows to search and replace in the XML GrAF file.

Methods

_write_file()[source]¶

Method that will write the changes in the XML file.

find_word(word, case_sensitive=True, whole_word=False)[source]¶

This method look for the given reference node to replace the word by the new word.

Parameters :

word : str

Word to be find.

case_sensitive : bool

Is to find the exact word.

whole_word : bool

Find the word in sentences or words.
replace_all(word, new_word)[source]¶

This method look for the given word in all the feature tags and then replace it by the new word.

Parameters :

word : str

Word to be replaced.

new_word : str

Word to replace the one that is being searched.
replace_word(word, new_word, ref_node)[source]¶

This method look for the given reference node to replace the word by the new word.

Parameters :

word : str

Word to be replaced.

new_word : str

Word to replace the one that is being searched.

ref_node : str

Reference to the node that contains the word to be replaced.
